languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Индустриальный мир{/g} Кьява Гамма, управляемый губернаторским домом Гапрак, обеспечивает ваш протекторат редкими полезными ископаемыми. Кроме того, на планете функционирует {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторум{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, который перерабатывает материалы и подготавливает их к дальнейшей транспортировке".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Индустриальный мир{/g} Кьява Гамма, управляемый губернаторским домом Гапрак, обеспечивает ваш протекторат редкими полезными ископаемыми. Кроме того, на планете функционирует {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторум{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, который перерабатывает материалы и подготавливает их к дальнейшей транспортировке".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Индустриальный мир{/g} Кьява Гамма, управляемый губернаторским домом Гапрак, обеспечивает ваш протекторат редкими полезными ископаемыми. Кроме того, на планете функционирует {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторум{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, который перерабатывает материалы и подготавливает их к дальнейшей транспортировке".

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your empire with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an Adeptus Mechanics manufactorum that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

languages.text: «El {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma está bajo gestión de los gobernadores de la casa Gaprak y abastece a su protectorado con recursos minerales raros. Además, en el planeta hay un {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} que procesa materiales y los prepara para envío».
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

traits.locale_text: «El {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} de Kiava Gamma está bajo gestión de los gobernadores de la casa Gaprak y abastece a su protectorado con recursos minerales raros. Además, en el planeta hay un {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} que procesa materiales y los prepara para envío».

languages.text: “那是个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}。基亚瓦伽马星由贾帕克家族负责管理，为您的领土提供稀有矿物资源。此外，这颗行星上还有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}，负责加工所有材料，安排运输方面的事宜。”
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

traits.locale_text: “那是个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}。基亚瓦伽马星由贾帕克家族负责管理，为您的领土提供稀有矿物资源。此外，这颗行星上还有{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}，负责加工所有材料，安排运输方面的事宜。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}であるキアヴァ・ガンマはギャプラック総督家が管理しており、保護領に希少な鉱物資源を供給しています。さらにここには{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}もあり、材料を処理して出荷の準備をしています」
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}であるキアヴァ・ガンマはギャプラック総督家が管理しており、保護領に希少な鉱物資源を供給しています。さらにここには{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}もあり、材料を処理して出荷の準備をしています」

languages.text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma wird von dem Gouverneurshaus Gaprak verwaltet und beliefert Euer Protektorat mit seltenen mineralischen Ressourcen. Außerdem befindet sich auf dem Planeten ein {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorum{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, das Materialien bearbeitet und zum Transport vorbereitet."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

traits.locale_text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} Kiava Gamma wird von dem Gouverneurshaus Gaprak verwaltet und beliefert Euer Protektorat mit seltenen mineralischen Ressourcen. Außerdem befindet sich auf dem Planeten ein {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorum{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, das Materialien bearbeitet und zum Transport vorbereitet."

languages.text: « Le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma est géré par la maison du gouverneur Gaprak et fournit des ressources minérales rares à votre protectorat. De plus, on y trouve un {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} qui traite les matériaux et les prépare pour leur expédition. »
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

traits.locale_text: « Le {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} de Kiava Gamma est géré par la maison du gouverneur Gaprak et fournit des ressources minérales rares à votre protectorat. De plus, on y trouve un {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} qui traite les matériaux et les prépare pour leur expédition. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Sınai dünya{/g} Kiava Gama, Valilik Hanesi Gapraklarca yönetilir ve protektoranıza nadir maden kaynakları tedarik eder. Ek olarak gezegende malzeme işleyip onları sevkiyata hazırlayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorumu{/g} da bulunur."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Industrial world{/g} Kiava Gamma is being managed by the Governor House of Gaprak and supplies your protectorate with rare mineral resources. Additionally, the planet features an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} that processes materials and prepares them for shipment."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Endüstri dünyası{/g} Kiava Gama, Gaprak Hanesi Valisi tarafından yönetilir ve protektoranıza nadir mineral kaynakları tedarik eder. Ek olarak gezegende materyalleri işleyen ve onları sevkiyata hazırlayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorum{/g}u da bulunur."
